text: Marie Muhammad (3 April 1939 - 11 December 2016) was an Indonesian politician and philanthropist. He served as the Minister of Finance under president Suharto between 1993 and 1998. He also served as chairman of the Indonesian Red Cross Society from 1998 to 2009. Muhammmad died of brain cancer on 11 December 2016 in Cawang, Jakarta. He was 77. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Indonesia Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Asian philanthropists
title: Marie Muhammad
